sentences.en: After a week's rain, everything in the house became damp and clammy.
sentences.cn: 接连下了七八天雨, 屋子里什么都是潮呼呼的.

sentences.en: Daybreak found us on a cold, clammy ship.
sentences.cn: 天亮时我们发现自己呆在一条冰冷黏湿的船上。

sentences.en: Every metal in the cockpit is cold, the seat belts are clammy.
sentences.cn: 驾驶舱里的每片金属都是冰凉的, 安全带则是黏糊糊的.

sentences.en: Get your clammy hands off me!
sentences.cn: 把你又湿又黏的手拿开，别碰我！

sentences.en: He clutched the cane in his clammy hand.
sentences.cn: 他那湿冷的手紧抓住手杖.

sentences.en: He passed his hand across his forehead. It was dank with clammy sweat.
sentences.cn: 他用手抹抹前额, 额上满是湿漉漉粘糊糊的汗珠.

sentences.en: Her face burned and her hands went clammy.
sentences.cn: 他脸上发烧,双手也变得粘搭搭的.

sentences.en: His skin felt cold and clammy.
sentences.cn: 他的皮肤摸上去冷冰冰湿乎乎的。

sentences.en: My clothes felt wet and clammy.
sentences.cn: 我的衣服摸起来又湿又粘.

sentences.en: My shirt stuck to the clammy sweat on my back.
sentences.cn: 衬衫贴到我汗津津的背上.

sentences.en: My shirt was clammy with sweat.
She gave a little shudder when she touched his clammy hand.
sentences.cn: 摸到他湿冷的手时,她微微一颤.

sentences.en: She put a clammy hand to his cheek.
sentences.cn: 他把一只汗津津的手放在他的脸颊上.

sentences.en: Shock victims often have a weak pulse, pale and clammy skin, and breathe with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 休克患者常常脉搏微弱, 皮肤苍白、湿冷, 呼吸困难.

sentences.en: The corners of his mouth drooped , his hands felt clammy.
sentences.cn: 他的嘴角紧闭,手掌心摸起来湿漉漉的.

sentences.en: Think of the clammy hands you get when you visit the dentist!
sentences.cn: 想想你去看牙医时那双黏糊糊的手！

words.tran_cn: 粘粘糊糊地；发粘地；冷漠地

trans.tran_en: feeling unpleasantly wet, cold, and sticky
